title: Mystic Messenger
description: A character-based visual novel with multiple routes and endings

start.title: Mystic Messenger Chat
start.description: You've joined the RFA chatroom. Several interesting members catch your attention. Who do you want to get closer to?

jumin_route.title: Getting to Know Jumin
jumin_route.description: Jumin Han, the heir to C&R International. He seems cold but there's something intriguing about him.

jumin_business_path.title: Corporate Connection
jumin_business_path.description: Jumin is impressed by your business acumen and invites you to his office.

jumin_personal_path.title: Personal Bond
jumin_personal_path.description: Jumin opens up about his beloved cat and his loneliness.

jumin_power_route.title: The Power Player
jumin_power_route.description: You and Jumin form a powerful business alliance, but emotions remain distant.

jumin_care_route.title: Caring Connection
jumin_care_route.description: You show genuine care for both Jumin and Elizabeth, creating a warm atmosphere.

jumin_emotion_route.title: Emotional Breakthrough
jumin_emotion_route.description: Jumin struggles with vulnerability but begins to open his heart.

jumin_good_ending.title: Jumin's Good Ending: Love and Success
jumin_good_ending.description: You and Jumin find perfect balance between love and ambition, creating a powerful partnership.

jumin_normal_ending.title: Jumin's Normal Ending: Professional Partnership
jumin_normal_ending.description: You maintain a successful but emotionally distant relationship with Jumin.

jumin_bad_ending.title: Jumin's Bad Ending: Isolation
jumin_bad_ending.description: Your approach backfires, causing Jumin to retreat further into isolation.

seven_route.title: Getting to Know Seven
seven_route.description: 707, the mysterious hacker with a cheerful facade. But you sense there's more beneath the surface.

choices.text: Try to be serious with him

seven_fun_path.title: Playful Connection
seven_fun_path.description: Seven appreciates your humor and shows you his collection of fancy cars and gadgets.

seven_serious_path.title: Serious Approach
seven_serious_path.description: Your serious attitude makes Seven drop his guard slightly, showing glimpses of his real self.

seven_tech_route.title: Into the Digital World
seven_tech_route.description: Seven brings you to his secret bunker, revealing his incredible hacking operation.

choices.text: What are you really working on?

seven_surface_route.title: Fun but Shallow
seven_surface_route.description: You and Seven have great chemistry, but he never lets you see his deeper side.

choices.text: I want to know the real you

seven_investigation_route.title: Dangerous Discovery
seven_investigation_route.description: Your investigation uncovers Seven's government agent identity and dangerous missions.

choices.text: This is too dangerous for me

seven_heart_route.title: Emotional Connection
seven_heart_route.description: Seven opens up about his loneliness and the burden of his secret life.

choices.text: Encourage him to quit his job

seven_truth_revelation.title: The Truth Unveiled
seven_truth_revelation.description: Seven reveals his identity as a government agent, but trusts you with his secret.

seven_secret_path.title: The Secret Mission
seven_secret_path.description: You join Seven in exposing a government conspiracy, knowing the personal cost.

seven_good_ending.title: Seven's Good Ending: Happiness Found
seven_good_ending.description: Seven learns to balance his duties with personal happiness, finding peace with you.

seven_bad_ending.title: Seven's Bad Ending: Forever Alone
seven_bad_ending.description: Seven disappears into his work, convinced he can never have normal relationships.

seven_normal_ending.title: Seven's Normal Ending: Surface Level
seven_normal_ending.description: You maintain a fun but shallow relationship, never truly knowing Seven's real self.

seven_secret_ending.title: Seven's Secret Ending: Ultimate Sacrifice
seven_secret_ending.description: You and Seven expose the conspiracy together, but pay the ultimate price for truth.

zen_route.title: Getting to Know Zen
zen_route.description: Zen, the narcissistic but passionate actor. His confidence is both charming and concerning.

zen_ego_path.title: Feeding the Ego
zen_ego_path.description: Zen loves the attention and shows off his modeling photos and motorcycle.

choices.text: But what about your acting dreams?

zen_talent_path.title: Recognizing True Talent
zen_talent_path.description: Zen is touched that you see beyond his looks and shows you his serious acting work.

zen_shallow_route.title: All About Looks
zen_shallow_route.description: Your focus on his appearance inflates Zen's ego but doesn't help his career.

zen_balance_route.title: Beauty and Talent
zen_balance_route.description: You help Zen find balance between confidence in his looks and dedication to his craft.

choices.text: Support him through his big audition
Worry about his ego getting out of control

zen_support_route.title: Dedicated Support
zen_support_route.description: You become Zen's acting coach and biggest supporter, helping him improve.

choices.text: Push him to be his best

zen_intense_route.title: Method Acting Madness
zen_intense_route.description: Zen dives deep into method acting, but it unleashes his dangerous 'beast' side.

zen_good_ending.title: Zen's Good Ending: Stardom and Love
zen_good_ending.description: Zen achieves his dreams of stardom while balancing fame, talent, and love with you.

zen_normal_ending.title: Zen's Normal Ending: Steady Relationship
zen_normal_ending.description: You maintain a stable relationship with Zen, though his ego sometimes causes issues.

zen_bad_ending.title: Zen's Bad Ending: Ego Destroyed
zen_bad_ending.description: Zen's confidence is shattered, leading to the end of both his acting career and your relationship.

cgDescriptions.jumin_intro: First meeting with the mysterious CEO Jumin
cgDescriptions.jumin_office: Jumin's impressive corporate office with city view
cgDescriptions.jumin_cat: Tender moment with Jumin and Elizabeth the 3rd
cgDescriptions.jumin_wine: Elegant wine tasting scene with Jumin
cgDescriptions.jumin_confession: Jumin's vulnerable confession about his feelings
cgDescriptions.jumin_despair: Jumin in despair after emotional rejection
cgDescriptions.seven_cars: Seven showing off his collection of sports cars
cgDescriptions.seven_emotional: Seven dropping his cheerful mask, showing vulnerability
cgDescriptions.seven_truth: The revelation of Seven's true identity
cgDescriptions.seven_vulnerable: Seven opening up about his loneliness
cgDescriptions.seven_happy: Seven's genuine smile after finding happiness
cgDescriptions.zen_intro: Encounter with the narcissistic actor Zen
cgDescriptions.zen_motorcycle: Zen posing with his motorcycle at sunset
cgDescriptions.zen_stage: Zen performing on stage under spotlights
cgDescriptions.zen_mirror: Zen admiring himself in the mirror
cgDescriptions.zen_rehearsal: Zen practicing lines with passionate dedication
cgDescriptions.zen_practice: Intensive acting practice session with Zen
cgDescriptions.zen_beast: Zen's dangerous 'beast' side awakening during method acting
cgDescriptions.zen_success: Zen achieving his dreams of stardom
